definitions.definition: natural ability or skill at doing something
definitions.sensetop: aptitude for somethingaptitude for doing something

examples.text: an **aptitude test** (= one designed to show whether somebody has the natural ability for a particular job or course of education)
She showed a natural aptitude for the work.
His aptitude for dealing with children got him the job.
children who show an aptitude for music

wordOrigin: late Middle English: via Old French from late Latin aptitudo, from aptus ‘fitted’, past participle of apere ‘fasten’.
